luda_type Struct Reference
[lu_dir]

Fid directory attribute: a fid of an object referenced by the entry. More...

#include <lustre_idl.h>

Data Fields

__u16 lt_type

Detailed Description

Fid directory attribute: a fid of an object referenced by the entry.

This will be almost always requested by the client and supplied by the server.

Aligned to 8 bytes. File type.

Aligned to 2 bytes.
